T02D1791:173b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D1791:173b-37: de dag la ni 'di tsam gyis don byed pa nyid kyis so ;
T02D1791:173b-38: / don zhes bya ba ni don gyi rgyan nyid du bstan pa yin no //

T02D1791:174a-5: // de rnams la chos kyi de nyid ni tshig

T02D1791:174a-10: bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'gal ba'i sgras so

T02D1791:174a-12: pa la snam bu'i sgra sbyor ba 'dra bas so
T02D1791:174a-13: // // de ni dgongs pas bshad ces bya ba 'dis ni sgra'i rgyan yin no //
T02D1791:174a-14: dkyil 'khor sogs dang rtog pa la //
T02D1791:174a-15: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1791:174a-16: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga sgrub pa'i skabs la ni
T02D1791:174a-17: sgra ji bzhin pa de bzhin gyi don de dkyil
T02D1791:174a-18: 'khor khru bcu gnyis pa bya'o zhes bstan pa la

T02D1791:174a-29: 'jig rten pa dang bstan bcos pa'o //

T02D1791:174a-45: de ni don med pa'i phyir ro //

T02D1791:174a-49: bcom ldan 'das kyis rtog ge pa dang /

T02D1791:174a-53: zhal snga nas kyis spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron mar

T02D1791:174b-1: du gzhan 'di bzung ba yin no //

T02D1791:174b-21: dgongs pa dang ji bzhin pa'i sgra bshad pa la

T02D1791:174b-23: / 'gal ba dang 'gal ba ma yin pa'i bye brag gis so //
T02D1791:174b-24: nges pa'i don dang dgongs pa ma yin pa'i don
T02D1791:174b-25: la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na
T02D1791:174b-27: rtul pa'i bye brag gis so //
T02D1791:174b-28: de bzhin du dgongs pa dang /
T02D1791:174b-30: ji bzhin ma yin pa'i sgrar bshad pa gsum ni sgra'i rgyan no //
T02D1791:174b-31: drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don dang /
T02D1791:174b-32: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa gsum ni don gyi rgyan yin no //
T02D1791:174b-33: bshad pa'i dbye ba bzhi bstan pa'i phyir tshig gi

T02D1791:174b-35: // dang po gcig pu kho na nyid //

T02D1791:174b-37: thams cad kyi spyi don gyi dbye ba ni rnam pa brgyad yin no //
T02D1791:174b-38: sgra tsam la ni rab gzhol ba'i //

T02D1791:174b-45: yi ge 'bru'i don gyis zhes pa sgra'i rgyan yin no //
T02D1791:174b-46: mdo sogs la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T02D1791:175a-13: sbas dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;

T02D1791:175a-15: sbas pa ji lta bu zhe na /

T02D1791:175b-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'chad pa po'i @175b rgyan bstan pa yin te /

T02D1791:175b-28: 'jig rten nges par gyur pa yi //

T02D1791:175b-43: autpala la sogs pa ni bstan pa yin no //

T02D1791:176a-1: ni lung tshad mar bstan pa yin no //

T02D1791:176a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D1791:176a-10: gzung bya mang du'ang zhes bya ba la sogs pa

T02D1791:176a-12: te / gzung bar bya ba ni chos kyi don no //

T02D1791:176a-23: bum pa'i ras bal gyi sa bon dang 'dra ste /
T02D1791:176a-24: bum par ras bal gyi sa bon bzhag na 'phel bar mi 'gyur te /
T02D1791:176a-25: de kho na bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro /
T02D1791:176a-27: // ras bal gyi sgra ni ras bal gyi sa bon la 'jug ste /
T02D1791:176a-28: bum pa'i nang nas 'bras bu skye bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bsams so //
T02D1791:176a-29: padma dkar po'i dri ni rang gi sbubs las gzhan du dri 'phro ba med pa de dang 'dra'o //
T02D1791:176a-30: dad dang ldan zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni padma zhes bya ba'i gang zag bstan te /

T02D1791:176a-33: de dang gang ldan pa ni dad pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1791:176a-34: shes pas ni yang dag par rtogs pa'o //

T02D1791:176b-0: chos 'chad @176b pa'i dus su slob mas thos par
T02D1791:176b-1: 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces

T02D1791:176b-5: khyab pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ngo bo

T02D1791:176b-8: thos pa nyung ba ni chos mnag po 'dzin pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D1791:176b-9: gal te brgya lam na slob dpon brtse ba'i dbang gis de bos te /
T02D1791:176b-10: kye bzhin bzang thos pa la goms par gyis shig dang /
T02D1791:176b-11: ji srid khyod kyi don du bshad pa la brtson par bya'o //
T02D1791:176b-13: thams cad kyang bdag gis shes pa yin te /
T02D1791:176b-14: de bas na bdag gi spyod yul du ma gyur
T02D1791:176b-15: pa ni gang yang med do zhes nga rgyal byed
T02D1791:176b-16: cing / de spangs nas gzhan du 'gro bar byed do //

T02D1791:176b-23: mi shes pa bde bar dga' bar nus //
T02D1791:176b-24: bye brag shes pa rab dgar nus //
